task: Government-assigned task: Get the petrochemical company off the hook.
article: A few days ago, several witnesses reported seeing the local petrochemical company dumping a liquid into (lake name). This lake is acts as a water supply for (town name).

options.petrochemical-company: The petrochemical company did indeed dump a liquid into the lake.
options.foreign-agents: (Lie) Foreign agents posing as employees of the petrochemical company dumped the liquid into the lake.
options.nobody: (Lie) Nobody dumped anything into the lake.

options.just-water: has assured us that the liquid that was dumped into the lake is just water.
options.toxic-chemicals: privately told our government contacts that the chemical that was dumped into the lake was radioactive waste.

identity: foreign-agents | nobody.message: Your readers saw through it. How would the petrochemical company know what was in the water if it didn't come from them?
